categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic space stations

nodes.text: The decommissioned husk of an Alliance Station existed in the Bright Jewel system during the time of the Galactic Civil War. The space station resembled one of many used by the Alliance to Restore the Republic.

The debris resembling an Alliance appeared in the 2003 video game Star Wars Galaxies: An Empire Divided, a massively multiplayer online role-playing game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011.
